segments.text: The woman looks so calm, like she’s in her own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I almost envy her focus, but the water is everywhere now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress is going to get soaked if she doesn’t move.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember doing the same thing when I was little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, reaching deep into that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t tip over and ruin the moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, like she’s about to get the best treat ever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is chaotic but kind of sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR
